content: In SDC, all of my examples declare a profile, but when I look at the QA, they're not listed as having validated against the QA. (And I'm pretty sure they're not because at least one of my examples is listed as associated to the wrong profile, which it's definitely not valid against, but also not raising validation messages for.)
You can see it if you look at SDC
looks ok to me now. try again after the next release
